archimate:TechnologyService.name: NCSA Batch Service for Production (Technology Service)
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation: This is access to a batch system where the configuration of the nodes is consistent with the Productin enclave Security Plan. An example concern is that production batch jobs may be able to read and write systems which the devleopment enclave nodes cannot. Also the overa ll resources of the batch pool are managed with a policy consistent with production needs.
